show.subtitle: Psychiatrist Peter R. Breggin, MD believes you can make a marvelous life.  Great guests, callers and conversations to inspire you.
show.title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour

title: Chrisanne Gordon, MD
content: Chrisanne Gordon, MD, her own life transformed by a traumatic brain injury, became an expert at helping returning… soldiers suffering from physical and emotional trauma.  Her personal story and her work explores what it means to be human and to find within yourself a spiritual connection that can triumph over injury to the mind and brain.   A wonderful hour that’s relevant to all of us!
